mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_number, notice_title, notice_date, notice_content, notice_count, member_id) values(seq_notice_number.nextval, #{notice_title}, sysdate, #{notice_content}, #{notice_count}, #{member_id})
mapper.update: update notice set notice_count = notice_count + 1 where notice_number = #{notice_number}
mapper.select: select b.* From (select rownum rnum, a.* From (select * from notice order by notice_number desc) a) b where b.rnum>=#{startRow} and b.rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content} where notice_number = #{notice_number}
mapper.select: select b.* From (select rownum rnum, a.* From (select * from report order by report_number desc) a) b where b.rnum>=#{startRow} and b.rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update sales set SALES_CHECK_BLIND = 1 where sales_number = #{sales_number}
update report set check_complete = 1 where sales_number = #{sales_number}
